svg:
<text x="600" y="70" font-family="SF Pro Text, -apple-system, system-ui, sans-serif"SF Pro '" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">9Bit Studios Launch Visual Concept <text x="600" y="110" font-family="SF Pro Text, -apple-system, system-ui, sans-serif"SF Pro '" font-size="18" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">Quantum Evolution Portal

<text x="0" y="0" font-family="SF Pro Text, -apple-system, system-ui, sans-serif"SF Pro '" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">Heritage <text x="0" y="25" font-family="SF Pro Text, -apple-system, system-ui, sans-serif"SF Pro '" font-size="14" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">8-bit foundation

<text x="0" y="0" font-family="SF Pro Text, -apple-system, system-ui, sans-serif"SF Pro '" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">Quantum <text x="0" y="25" font-family="SF Pro Text, -apple-system, system-ui, sans-serif"SF Pro '" font-size="14" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">Spatial materialization
